desc.en: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.jp: This page lists the chapter numbers and titles of all main story.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: Abydos is in danger of getting shut down. Help the Foreclosure Task Force save the academy!
desc.jp: Abydos is in danger of getting shut down. Help the Foreclosure Task Force save the academy!
desc.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯高中面临了废校危机。和对策委员会一起保护学校吧！

name.en: Strange Days for the Task Force
name.jp: Strange Days for the Task Force
name.zh_cn: 对策委员会奇妙的一天

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force was formed to prevent Abydos High School from closing. The school's debt persists despite the students' best efforts.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force was formed to prevent Abydos High School from closing. The school's debt persists despite the students' best efforts.
desc.zh_cn: 为了阻止废校而建立的对策委员会。虽然每天都在苦撑，但学校的债务一点都没有减少的迹象。

name.en: Things Lost and Others Held On To
name.jp: Things Lost and Others Held On To
name.zh_cn: 失去的事物，未曾放弃的事物

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is hanging on by a thread. Will they be able to fight back against the conspiracy that threatens their academy's survival?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force is hanging on by a thread. Will they be able to fight back against the conspiracy that threatens their academy's survival?
desc.zh_cn: 陷入困境的阿拜多斯对策委员会。与威胁阿拜多斯高中存亡的阴谋斗争，结果会是……？

desc.en: The Game Development Department is in need of assistance. Help them produce a fantastic video game by the deadline!
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is in need of assistance. Help them produce a fantastic video game by the deadline!
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部正在请求协助。必须在限时内做出完美的游戏！

desc.en: The Game Development Department is in danger of getting shut down due to declining membership and performance. Can the ragtag band of gamers come together to make the best video game ever?
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is in danger of getting shut down due to declining membership and performance. Can the ragtag band of gamers come together to make the best video game ever?
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千禧年的游戏开发部陷入了废社危机。热爱游戏但成员与实绩都不足的她们，能顺利制作出“神作”吗？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 千年的游戏开发部陷入了废社危机。热爱游戏但成员与实绩都不足的她们，能顺利制作出“神作”吗？
desc.zh_cn_cn: 千年的游戏开发部陷入了废社危机。热爱游戏但成员与实绩都不足的她们，能顺利制作出“神作”吗？

name.en: The Romance of Friendship, Courage, and Light
name.jp: The Romance of Friendship, Courage, and Light
name.zh_cn: 友情与勇气与希望的浪漫

desc.en: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.jp: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部全员为了下一届千禧年大赏，开始制作新游戏。但就在这时，学生会长莉央出现了……被告知的真相与突如其来的危机，游戏开发部能平安渡过此劫吗？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部全员为了下一届千年大赏，开始制作新游戏。但就在这时，学生会长莉央出现了……被告知的真相与突如其来的危机，游戏开发部能平安渡过此劫吗？
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部全员为了下一届千年大赏，开始制作新游戏。但就在这时，学生会长莉央出现了……被告知的真相与突如其来的危机，游戏开发部能平安渡过此劫吗？

desc.en: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?
desc.jp: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌赫娜和崔尼蒂是死对头。这两间学校真的能和解吗？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜和三一是死对头。这两间学校真的能和解吗？
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜和三一是死对头。这两间学校真的能和解吗？

name.en: Make-Up Work Club, Here We Go!
name.jp: Make-Up Work Club, Here We Go!

desc.en: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.jp: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.zh_cn_jp: 四名崔尼蒂的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！
desc.zh_cn_tw: 四名三一的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！
desc.zh_cn_cn: 四名三一的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！

desc.en: Conspiracy and betrayal, suspicion and doubt, scheming and shadow wars are running rampant. Will Sensei be able to safely overcome the crisis with the Make-Up Work Club students?
desc.jp: Conspiracy and betrayal, suspicion and doubt, scheming and shadow wars are running rampant. Will Sensei be able to safely overcome the crisis with the Make-Up Work Club students?
desc.zh_cn: 在这个阴谋、怀疑与背叛交际的黑暗中，补课部的学生们能平安度过这场危机吗？

desc.en: The time to sign the Eden Treaty has finally come, and little by little, small cracks begin to form in everyone's daily lives. Each story begins to converge as catastrophe looms.
desc.jp: The time to sign the Eden Treaty has finally come, and little by little, small cracks begin to form in everyone's daily lives. Each story begins to converge as catastrophe looms.
desc.zh_cn: 终于迎来了伊甸园条约签字仪式的当天。看似和平的日常生活出现了裂缝，混乱与憎恶的入侵正在加速。最终收束的目的地将会是“破局”，还是——

name.en: Chapter 4 - Kyrie of the Forgotten Gods
name.jp: Chapter 4 - Kyrie of the Forgotten Gods
name.zh_cn: 为了被遗忘的神祇们的垂怜经

desc.en: The Arius Squad has been abandoned. Will there be mercy for the students who are lost to its teachings of hatred and anger?
desc.jp: The Arius Squad has been abandoned. Will there be mercy for the students who are lost to its teachings of hatred and anger?
desc.zh_cn: 被自己所属的学院抛弃的奥利斯小队——徘徊于憎恶与愤怒之间的她们，真的存在着慈悲吗？

desc.en: An academy has disappeared overnight. What is the destiny of SRT's new students?
desc.jp: An academy has disappeared overnight. What is the destiny of SRT's new students?
desc.zh_cn: SRT特殊学院在一夜之间突然遭到关闭。新生们的命运将会如何呢……？

desc.en: The RABBIT Squad students are occupying the park, protesting the closure notice of the SRT Academy. Will the squad members survive the harsh conditions of camping in the park?
desc.jp: The RABBIT Squad students are occupying the park, protesting the closure notice of the SRT Academy. Will the squad members survive the harsh conditions of camping in the park?
desc.zh_cn: 突然下达了SRT特殊学院的废校命令。RABBIT小队的学生们不能接受，开始在公园过着露宿野外的生活以示反抗……？

name.zh_cn: Final. 所有奇迹的起点篇

desc.en: A fissure splits open the daily lives of Kivotos citizens. In a story subverted, where does Schale fall?
desc.jp: A fissure splits open the daily lives of Kivotos citizens. In a story subverted, where does Schale fall?
desc.zh_cn: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——

desc.en: The General Student Council has uncovered anomalies in Kivotos. While Rin convenes an Emergency Response Committee and many forces seek to capitalize on the chaos, will Schale be able to overcome the crisis?
desc.jp: The General Student Council has uncovered anomalies in Kivotos. While Rin convenes an Emergency Response Committee and many forces seek to capitalize on the chaos, will Schale be able to overcome the crisis?
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟夏莱能不能克服这个危机呢？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟夏莱能不能克服这个危机呢？
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟沙勒能不能克服这个危机呢？

name.zh_cn: 第二篇-虚假的圣所攻略战

desc.en: Six ominous towers have been erected in Kivotos. Can Sensei and their students protect Academy City from the threat of the Chroma and overcome the False Sanctums?
desc.jp: Six ominous towers have been erected in Kivotos. Can Sensei and their students protect Academy City from the threat of the Chroma and overcome the False Sanctums?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯突然出现了六座高塔。天空被不祥的赤红笼罩，未曾出现的威胁向奇普托斯袭来——老师能够顺利解决这个状况吗？

name.en: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占領戰
name.jp: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占領戰
name.zh_cn: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战

desc.en: 「虛假的聖所攻略戰」順利結束，本應重新奪回平穩的天空。然而作為「虛假的聖所」前兆的不可思議的能量再次被發現──究竟老師能不能夠阻止這個狀況呢？
desc.jp: 「虛假的聖所攻略戰」順利結束，本應重新奪回平穩的天空。然而作為「虛假的聖所」前兆的不可思議的能量再次被發現──究竟老師能不能夠阻止這個狀況呢？
desc.zh_cn: 「虚假的圣所攻略战」顺利结束，本应重新夺回平稳的天空。然而作为「虚假的圣所」前兆的不可思议的能量再次被发现──究竟老师能不能够阻止这个状况呢？

desc.en: 占領鎮守於75,000m高空的方舟後，一連串的騷動總算落幕──然而並非如此。誘騙者出現在老師的面前。他的意圖與這個故事的終點究竟為何──？
desc.jp: 占領鎮守於75,000m高空的方舟後，一連串的騷動總算落幕──然而並非如此。誘騙者出現在老師的面前。他的意圖與這個故事的終點究竟為何──？
desc.zh_cn: 占领镇守于75,000m高空的方舟后，一连串的骚动总算落幕──然而并非如此。诱骗者出现在老师的面前。他的意图与这个故事的终点究竟为何──？
